There should be something like updateRequired = true; at the bottom of their, or the server wont send the signal to the client to update its display.

item.title: Need some Help with my command
item.dc:creator: @loler loler
item.description:
@loler wrote:

Hi everyone, Last time I made my own server while coding most of it myself (minus a few little bits) I got a command working that added the correct ammount of xp for lvl 99 (13034000 If i remember correctly) but Now when I try with my code:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skillsplease") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(13034000, 0); addSkillXP(13034000, 1); addSkillXP(13034000, 2); addSkillXP(13034000, 3); addSkillXP(13034000, 4); addSkillXP(13034000, 5); addSkillXP(13034000, 6); addSkillXP(13034000, 7); addSkillXP(13034000, 8); addSkillXP(13034000, 9); addSkillXP(13034000, 10); addSkillXP(13034000, 11); addSkillXP(13034000, 12); addSkillXP(13034000, 13); addSkillXP(13034000, 14); addSkillXP(13034000, 15); addSkillXP(13034000, 16); addSkillXP(13034000, 17); addSkillXP(13034000, 18); addSkillXP(13034000, 19); addSkillXP(13034000, 20); }
It doesnt seem to want to work? Maybe its the positioning? (I dont remember as I havnt done any coding for a while) I have it placed under:
else if (command.startsWith("redphat") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(1038,1); }
along with all the other item spawn commands.

Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: October 31, 2006, 04:50:35 PM[/size][hr]No one wanna Help?

Read full topic
